title: book_Maud_Hart_Lovelace's_Deep_Valley
text:
ISBN-13: 9780971316829.
ISBN-10: 0971316821.
Title: Maud Hart Lovelace's Deep Valley.
Subtitle: A Guidebook of Mankato Places in the Betsy-Tacy Series.
Authors: Julie A. Schrader.
Categories: Authors, American.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=pYuWAAAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Photography and historical information about the places and faces featured in the Betsy-Tacy Deep Valley books. Includes a removable map containing a walking or driving tour of the locations featured in the books, bibliographies of books by Maud Hart Lovelace, a list of characters and their real-life counterparts, and a membership application for the Betsy-Tacy Society..
Published Year: 2002.
Average Rating: 4.29.
Number of Pages: 325.
Ratings Count: 58.
